extendedInfo.description: As a Dodge vehicle owner, we know you are the resourceful type. Thatâs why we created this innovative âDrive DODGEâ app to put information right at your fingertipsâ¦where you need it, when you need it. Whether itâs providing information about specific product features relative to your new Dodge vehicle, taking a tour through the Dodge brand heritage, or connecting you with the extended Dodge family, we know youâll find the information within our app useful. So much so, we believe the Drive DODGE app is the new âessentialâ for owners and fans of Dodge vehicles.Key app features include vehicle operating instructions and driving controls, inspection and maintenance schedules, warning lights and indicators, dealer locator, parking reminder, and customer assistance. Other features and benefits include links to Mopar parts and accessories, Dodge gear and merchandise, and Dodge social media sites.All 2012-2013 vehicle models are currently supported. To configure the app with your specific Dodge vehicle, simply select the âSettingsâ tab and create a vehicle profile to specify the model(s) of interest.  In addition, we recommend you register your app to become eligible for future updates and potential incentives relative to your Dodge product(s). Configuration and registration is quick and simple.We hope you find the information in this app helpful and congratulations on the purchase of your new Dodge vehicle.  Enjoy!Dodge is a registered trademark of Chrysler Group LLC. Â© Copyright 2012 Chrysler Group LLC. All Rights Reserved.

reviews.title: Needs update for newer devices!
reviews.comment: App does not scale for newer devices with HD screens. The main menu looks like crap on my Galaxy S4.
reviews.author: Ron Z

reviews.title: Besides the fact that this app seems to disturb my whole phone...
reviews.comment: ...this is a pretty good app. It only benefits brand new car buyers and dodge salesmen. As a salesman it\'s been golden to me when I need help on certain vehicle features. Its very I am depth. But u kinda left older dodge drivers hangin.
reviews.author: Malcom Gross

reviews.title: Lame, its only for 2012 & 2013 models
reviews.comment: Dont download if you own an older model, it would be useless.

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: I own a 2012 charger and this app is pretty cool. Its like having the owners manual in app forum. This is for 2012 and 2013 owners only.
reviews.author: Chris Verret

reviews.title: Not so hot
reviews.comment: Very small font, can not change the size. Try to check out the some of the pages, useless
reviews.author: William Bobzin

reviews.title: EPIC FAIL
reviews.comment: This app not only crashes, it crashes the operating system on my phone! Personally I consider it disruptive, and it needs an overhaul ASAP! ...Still waiting on that update!!

reviews.title: Might be a nice app if....
reviews.comment: I could select a car!  Will not display a list of car models for me to pick my new car.

reviews.comment: Seems like a great app.  Resolution needs to be fixed to fit HTC One.

reviews.title: Does not work on my phone
reviews.comment: Will not let me select a vehicle. After selecting yes nothing happens. I\'ll keep checking in and change my rating if fixed. Nexus 4.

reviews.comment: Good

reviews.title: Only new cars

reviews.title: Not Complete
reviews.comment: After installing in the notification area it says \'successfully installed \"null\"\'   Lacks finish and polish.   All I want is the specific service schedule for my car and the ability to track and record that service. Frequently it say refer to the complete maintenance schedule on dvd. Give me the complete schedule here! Useless!
reviews.author: Michael Orth

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Not everybody has a brand new Dodge...

reviews.title: 2011-2013 drivers only
reviews.comment: The only vehicles you can select are dodges made from 2011- present. It would be a great app if it had older models.
